```{r Data,echo=F}
library(plotly)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
NumOfGenes=3110742714
Q1Loc=NumOfGenes/4
Q2Loc=NumOfGenes/2
Q3Loc=NumOfGenes*3/4

Dataframe=read.table(file = "../results/2021-05-24/histogramTable.TSV.gz", sep = '\t', header = TRUE)%>%
  mutate(Genome=ifelse(Genome=="GCA_000001405.28_GRCh38.p13_genomic","Human","Mouse"))
HumanFreq=Dataframe%>%
  filter(Genome=="Human")
MouseFreq=Dataframe%>%
  filter(Genome=="Mouse")

longerVersion=pivot_longer(Dataframe,X4:X100)%>%
  mutate(x=as.numeric(x),weighted=x*value)

numericnames=longerVersion%>%
  mutate(name=as.numeric(substr(name,2,1000000)))

numericnamesSumer=numericnames%>%
  group_by(name,Genome)%>%
  summarize(mean=sum(weighted)/sum(value),numkmer=sum(weighted))%>%
  mutate(random=NumOfGenes/4^name)

longerVersionCum=numericnames%>%
  group_by(name,Genome)%>%
  mutate(weighted=ifelse(is.na(weighted),0,weighted))%>%
  mutate(locater=cumsum(weighted))

#simi histogram data
Q1=longerVersionCum%>%
  filter(locater>Q1Loc)%>%
  group_by(name,Genome)%>%
  filter(locater==min(locater),weighted!=0)%>%
  mutate(Loc="Q1")
Q2=longerVersionCum%>%
  filter(locater>Q2Loc)%>%
  group_by(name,Genome)%>%
  filter(locater==min(locater),weighted!=0)%>%
  mutate(Loc="Q2")
Q3=longerVersionCum%>%
  filter(locater>Q3Loc)%>%
  group_by(name,Genome)%>%
  filter(locater==min(locater),weighted!=0)%>%
  mutate(Loc="Q3")
quint=rbind(Q1,Q2,Q3)%>%
  select(-locater)%>%
  select(-value,-weighted)%>%
  pivot_wider(names_from = Loc,values_from=x)%>%
  arrange(name)

```


```{r Graphics}
quint%>%
  mutate(name=ifelse(Genome=="Human",name+.4,name))%>%
  ggplot()+aes(color=Genome,x=name)+geom_point(aes(y=Q2))+scale_y_log10()+geom_segment(aes(xend=name,y=Q1,yend=Q3))+xlab("Kmer Size")+ylab("frequency")

quint%>%
  mutate(name=ifelse(Genome=="Human",name+.4,name))%>%
  filter(name<60)%>%
  ggplot()+aes(color=Genome,x=name)+geom_point(aes(y=Q2))+geom_segment(aes(xend=name,y=Q1,yend=Q3))+xlab("Kmer Size")+ylab("frequency")+scale_y_log10()

#4^k

for (i in 0:9){
  print(i)
  ploter=numericnames%>%
    filter((name-1)%/%10==i)%>%
    ggplot(aes(x=x,y=value,color=Genome))+geom_point(alpha=.4)+scale_y_log10()+scale_x_log10()+ggtitle(paste("histo of",i*10+1,"mer","to ",i*10+10,"mer"))+xlab("repetitions of kmer")+ylab("number of Kmers")+facet_wrap(~name,scales="free")
  filename=paste("histo of",i*10+1,"mer","to ",i*10+10,"mer")
  ggsave(filename,plot=ploter,device="png")
}
```
